name: Code11ChecksumPolicy
summary: Policy for handling optional Code 11 checksum characters.

fields.name: None
fields.summary: Do not strip checksum characters (default, avoids accidental data loss).

fields.name: StripIfValid
fields.summary: Strip trailing checksum character(s) when valid.

fields.name: RequireValid
fields.summary: Require valid checksum character(s); otherwise decoding fails.
